name: 21st century human loneliness
description:
Twenty-first century man, especially of the urban type, is instinctively lonely and involved in the necessities and challenges of machine life. The emergence of cyberspace and the resulting social networks has made it a safe haven for him to distance himself as much as possible from his real life and his shortcomings, and to take refuge in an environment where he can hide his identity if necessary and many of his unspoken In the context of a conservative society, it does not have the ability and ability to reflect and immerses itself, to express peace of mind.
Of course, this coin has another side; Social rupture. The user who is so immersed in cyberspace will definitely be unaware of the individual and collective relationships that are going on in the real world and around him, and will be alienated from this environment, willingly or unwillingly. Such a practice over time prevents him from communicating with the people he deals with in society and even those around him in the first place.
This is my work of art from the 21st century man, surrounded by codes and numbers.
